publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3054 John Scott: ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group—That the Parliament welcomes ME awareness week, 12-19 May 2002, which aims to raise the profile of the disease, myalgic encephalomyelitis; recognises in particular the role that the 25% ME Group based in Troon play in improving the lives of people affected by ME and the lives of their families, and calls for further research aimed at ensuring a greater understanding of the biological processes of the disease.
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Margaret Jamieson*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Alex Fergusson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3054 John Scott: ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group—That the Parliament welcomes ME awareness week, 12-19 May 2002, which aims to raise the profile of the disease, myalgic encephalomyelitis; recognises in particular the role that the 25% ME Group based in Troon play in improving the lives of people affected by ME and the lives of their families, and calls for further research aimed at ensuring a greater understanding of the biological processes of the disease. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Alex Fergusson, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Christine Grahame*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-3054 ME Awareness Week, 12-19 May 2002 and the 25% ME Group (lodged on 30 April 2002) Linda Fabiani*
